alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, south central Houston, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Holmes Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 927 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Marianna, moving west at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Slocomb, Malone, Malvern, Greenwood, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Noma, Bascom, Garretts Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Southern Junction, Holland Crossroads, Merritts Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Jacobs, Noma Junction and Ellaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
